description: To maximize profit, which mines should be operated each year and how much should they produce? The company has K mines and can operate at most MaxWork in any given year. For each mine k, there is a royalty cost of Royalty, a production limit of Limit, and the material extracted has a quality of Quality. Each client i requires a material with at least RequiredQuality. The price per unit of material sold is Price, with a discount Discount applied to the royalty cost for each unit sold.
